程序包 edu.ftp.client

接口 FTPClient

  • 所有已知实现类:
    FTPClientImpl
    public interface FTPClient
    FTP client interface for modern FTP servers. Implementations on both RFC 959 and RFC 3659 are required on the server side.

    • 方法概要
